typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as integer,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		HIRE_DATE as string,
		JOB_ID as string,
		SALARY as decimal(10,0),
		COMMISSION_PCT as decimal(10,0),
		MANAGER_ID as integer,
		DEPARTMENT_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Employees
source(output(
		DEPARTMENT_ID as integer,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME as string,
		MANAGER_ID as integer,
		LOCATION_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'decimal') ~> Departments
Employees aggregate(groupBy(DEPARTMENT_ID),
	DeptwiseTotal_Salary = sum(SALARY),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AggOnDeptwise
AggOnDeptwise sort(asc(DEPARTMENT_ID, false),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DeptWiseSorting
DeptWiseSorting keyGenerate(output(SNO as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SequenceNo
SequenceNo, Departments lookup(AggOnDeptwise@DEPARTMENT_ID == Departments@DEPARTMENT_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDeptName
LookupDeptName select(mapColumn(
		SNO,
		DEPARTMENT_ID = AggOnDeptwise@DEPARTMENT_ID,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME,
		DeptwiseTotal_Salary
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReorderColums
ReorderColums sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DeptWiseTotSalary.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DeptwiseTotSalary

source(output(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as short,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		HIRE_DATE as string,
		JOB_ID as string,
		SALARY as short,
		COMMISSION_PCT as short,
		MANAGER_ID as string,
		DEPARTMENT_ID as short,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME as string,
		LOCATION_ID as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Employees
source(output(
		DEPARTMENT_ID as integer,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME as string,
		MANAGER_ID as integer,
		LOCATION_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Departments
Employees, Departments exists(Employees@DEPARTMENT_ID == Departments@DEPARTMENT_ID,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ValidateDeptExists
ValidateDeptExists sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['EmpDeptExists.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EmpDeptExists

source(output(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as integer,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		HIRE_DATE as date,
		JOB_ID as string,
		SALARY as decimal(10,0),
		COMMISSION_PCT as decimal(10,0),
		MANAGER_ID as integer,
		DEPARTMENT_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> EmpSCR
source(output(
		DEPARTMENT_ID as integer,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME as string,
		MANAGER_ID as integer,
		LOCATION_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DeptSCR
EmpSCR, DeptSCR join(EmpSCR@DEPARTMENT_ID == DeptSCR@DEPARTMENT_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinEmpDept
JoinEmpDept select(mapColumn(
		EMPLOYEE_ID,
		FIRST_NAME,
		LAST_NAME,
		EMAIL,
		PHONE_NUMBER,
		HIRE_DATE,
		JOB_ID,
		SALARY,
		COMMISSION_PCT,
		MANAGER_ID = EmpSCR@MANAGER_ID,
		DEPARTMENT_ID = EmpSCR@DEPARTMENT_ID,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME,
		LOCATION_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(COMMISSION_PCT = iifNull(COMMISSION_PCT, 10)) ~> DerivedCommissionVal
DerivedCommissionVal sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['EmpDept_Details.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		EMPLOYEE_ID,
		FIRST_NAME,
		LAST_NAME,
		EMAIL,
		PHONE_NUMBER,
		HIRE_DATE,
		JOB_ID,
		SALARY,
		COMMISSION_PCT,
		MANAGER_ID,
		DEPARTMENT_ID,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME,
		LOCATION_ID
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EmpDeptTraget

source(output(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as integer,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		HIRE_DATE as string,
		SALARY as integer,
		COMMISSION_PCT as double,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME as string,
		DEPARTMENT_ID7 as integer,
		DEPARTMENT_ID8 as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'Source_File_path',
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> EmpDeptSCR
EmpDeptSCR split(equals(DEPARTMENT_NAME,'IT'),
	equals(DEPARTMENT_NAME,'Executive'),
	equals(DEPARTMENT_NAME, 'Purchasing'),
	equals(DEPARTMENT_NAME, 'Shipping'),
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CondlSplitondep@(IT, Executive, Purchasing, Shipping, Sales)
CondlSplitondep@IT derive(COMMISSION_PCT = iifNull(COMMISSION_PCT, 10)) ~> CommNVLReplace
CommNVLReplace sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ITEmployee_Details.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		EMPLOYEE_ID,
		FIRST_NAME,
		LAST_NAME,
		HIRE_DATE,
		SALARY,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME,
		COMMISSION_PCT
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ITEmpRecords
CondlSplitondep@Executive sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ExecuteEmp_detail.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		EMPLOYEE_ID,
		FIRST_NAME,
		LAST_NAME,
		HIRE_DATE,
		SALARY,
		COMMISSION_PCT,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ExecuteEmpDetails
CondlSplitondep@Purchasing sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['PurchaseEmpdetails.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		EMPLOYEE_ID,
		FIRST_NAME,
		LAST_NAME,
		HIRE_DATE,
		SALARY,
		COMMISSION_PCT,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PurchaseEmpdetails
CondlSplitondep@Shipping sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ShippingeEmpdetails.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		EMPLOYEE_ID,
		FIRST_NAME,
		LAST_NAME,
		HIRE_DATE,
		SALARY,
		COMMISSION_PCT,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ShippingeEmpdetails
CondlSplitondep@Sales sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SalesEmpdetails.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SalesEmpdetails

source(output(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as integer,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		HIRE_DATE as string,
		SALARY as integer,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME as string,
		COMMISSION_PCT as decimal(10,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'decimal') ~> ITEmployee
source(output(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as integer,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		HIRE_DATE as string,
		SALARY as integer,
		COMMISSION_PCT as decimal(10,0),
		DEPARTMENT_NAME as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'decimal') ~> ExecuteEmployee
source(output(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as integer,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		HIRE_DATE as string,
		SALARY as integer,
		COMMISSION_PCT as decimal(10,0),
		DEPARTMENT_NAME as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'decimal') ~> ShippingEmp
ExecuteEmployee, ITEmployee, ShippingEmp union(byName: true)~> UnionEmpolyee
UnionEmpolyee window(over(DEPARTMENT_NAME),
	asc(SALARY, true),
	DenseRank = denseRank()) ~> Window
Window sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DeptWiseSalaryRank.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DeptWiseSalaryRank
